alert.note: Alert for Barber; Clark; Comanche; Kiowa; Meade; Morton; Pratt; Seward; Stevens (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 04 at 5:33PM CDT until April 04 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...Critical Fire Conditions Continue Near Oklahoma... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 080, 081, 084, 085, 086, 087, 088, 089, AND 090... * AFFECTED AREA...In Kansas, Fire Weather Zone 080 Kiowa, Fire Weather Zone 081 Pratt, Fire Weather Zone 084 Morton, Fire Weather Zone 085 Stevens, Fire Weather Zone 086 Seward, Fire Weather Zone 087 Meade, Fire Weather Zone 088 Clark, Fire Weather Zone 089 Comanche and Fire Weather Zone 090 Barber. * WINDS...West 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. Winds becoming northwest this evening. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 5 percent. * IMPACTS...Any ignition will have the potential to exhibit extreme fire behavior, and burn out of control. High end dangerous wildfire potential exists.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Barber; Clark; Comanche; Kiowa; Meade; Morton; Pratt; Seward; Stevens
